data.message: Why do I need to install an app just to read private messages? And why are friend request acceptance notifications going to messages and not notifications? Seems like you are trying to force people to download a useless app.

replies.message: Hi Tia. We're confident Messenger is the way to provide a faster and more reliable experience. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2eHIfS8. -Jessica

No thanks. Messenger worked just fine through the browser on my phone until that was taken away too. I don't use messenger enough to constitute downloading the app and the only time I do use it is to make the stupid friend request notification go away.
If you are confident then why don't people have the choice to download it and why is it only rated 1.5 stars in the app store?

I deleted FB all together and just use an app called puffin. It is an internet browser and lets you access all of FB w/o them forcing you to use their crappy one which they are way over confident about.
